Package org.ireas.mediawiki

Provides a simple interface to the MediaWiki API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MediaWiki
    Interface to the API of a MediaWiki installation.
    MediaWikiConfiguration
    Configuration for a MediaWiki instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiConstants
    Provides constants used by the MediaWiki API, e. g. the names of the parameters, keywords and the name of result fields.
    BasicMediaWikiConfiguration
    Configuration object for MediaWiki instances.
    DefaultMediaWiki
    Default implementation of the MediaWiki interfaces.
    MediaWikiFactory
    Factory for MediaWiki instances.
    MediaWikiUtils
    Utility class for org.ireas.mediawiki.
    UserData
    Stores the metadata for on user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Namespace
    Defines the default MediaWiki namespaces and the namespaces used in WMF wikis.

Package org.ireas.mediawiki Description

Provides a simple interface to the MediaWiki API.

The main interface providing the access methods is MediaWiki. To create a new MediaWiki instance, use the MediaWikiFactory. It is recommended to create a custom MediaWikiConfiguration before creating a MediaWiki. 

 // Step 1: configuration (set the user agent)
 MediaWikiFactory.setConfiguration(new BasicMediaWikiConfiguration(
         "My user agent"));
 // Step 2: creating a MediaWiki instance
 MediaWiki mediaWiki = MediaWikiFactory.newWikipediaInstance("de");
 // Step 3: accessing the API
 mediaWiki.getFirstEdit("Ireas");
